body.value:
{
    "To":"Anand.Pandian@elait.com",
    "Subject":"Pipeline Failed Remainder",
    "Body":"Hi Anand! Your Pipeline has Failed  
     Please checkit with following Pipeline detail",
    "Data factory name":"Adf Name : @{pipeline().DataFactory}",
    "Pipeline Name":"Pipeline Name : @{pipeline().Pipeline}",
    "Pipeline Run Id":"Pipeline RunId : @{pipeline().RunId}",
    "Pipeline trigger Name":"Trigger Name : @{pipeline().TriggerName}",
    "Pipeline trigger Name":"Trigger Type : @{pipeline().TriggerType}",
    "Pipeline trigger time":"Trigger time : @{pipeline().TriggerTime}",
    "Error Message":"Error Message : @{activity('Copy data1').output.errors[0].Message}"
}
